short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to notify you when your next horn is ready in MouseHunt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title: MouseHunt Horn Alert

Description:
Stay on top of your MouseHunt adventures with MouseHunt Horn Alert, the convenient Chrome extension that notifies you when your horn is ready! No more missing out on valuable hunts while waiting for that crucial moment. Just pin up the extension and watch as the timer counts down to the next horn!

Features:
- Receive instant notifications when your horn is ready to use.
- Simply click on the notification to be instantly redirected to your MouseHunt page, ready to embark on your next hunt.

Compatibility:
MouseHunt Horn Timer is compatible with Google Chrome and OperaGX browsers.

Browser Support:
Currently supported browsers: Google Chrome, OperaGX.
Note: I do not have any intentions of extending this extension to other browsers currently.

Open Source:
MouseHunt Horn Alert is an open-source extension, personally maintained by MelvinCZJ, ensuring transparency and community-driven development. Leave a review to let me know how this can be improved! For developers, feel free to modify or improve upon the extension as you see fit!

Privacy Assurance:
Rest assured, MouseHunt Horn Alert prioritizes your privacy. It does not collect any user information. The extension monitors web requests solely to detect sounding of the horn on the MouseHunt website, ensuring minimal intrusion into your browsing experience.

Bug Reporting:
While I strive to provide a seamless experience, please note that there may be occasional bugs. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, I encourage you to drop a review and report the bugs. Providing steps to replicate the issue will greatly assist us in resolving it promptly and enhancing your experience with MouseHunt Horn Alert.

Disclaimer:
MouseHunt Horn Alert is designed to enhance your MouseHunt experience without compromising game integrity. As confirmed by HitGrab, MouseHunt Horn Alert operates within the permissible boundaries by providing timely notifications without directly influencing gameplay. 

About the Developer:
MouseHunt Horn Alert is a personal project developed by MelvinCZJ, dedicated to delivering a seamless and enjoyable MouseHunt experience for fellow hunters. 

Attribution:
The air horn icon is made by Mihimihi from www.flaticon.com. It is used for both the extension icon, as well as the store icon.

Download MouseHunt Horn Alert now and never miss another horn call in MouseHunt!
